LanguageData.Mech_Apocriton.label: apocriton
LanguageData.Mech_Apocriton.description: A mechanoid commander designed to coordinate and motivate other mechs during long extermination campaigns. Its most obvious power is its ability to resurrect recently-killed mechs by supercharging their self-repair processes. Less obviously, it is intelligent and psychically present, radiating hatred into the minds of anyone in a wide radius. It can also move quickly with its built-in jump launcher.\n\nWhile all mechanoids have a dim psychically-present intelligence, only the apocriton and a few others truly feel hatred for their victims and understand the suffering they inflict.
LanguageData.Mech_Apocriton.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Mech_Legionary.label: legionary
LanguageData.Mech_Legionary.description: A combat support mechanoid with a wide range bullet shield and long-range needle gun. Designed to support other mechanoids from long range, the legionary is vulnerable to anyone who can get inside its shield.
LanguageData.Mech_Legionary.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.Mech_Legionary.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.Mech_Legionary.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Mech_Scorcher.label: scorcher
LanguageData.Mech_Scorcher.description: A close-approach war mechanoid that specializes in incendiary attacks. Its flame burst attack has little reach, but once it closes on a group of defenders it can ignite and disrupt them with blasts of searing flame.
LanguageData.Mech_Scorcher.tools.front_left_leg.label: front left leg
LanguageData.Mech_Scorcher.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.Mech_Tesseron.label: tesseron
LanguageData.Mech_Tesseron.description: A medium-range combat mechanoid. While it is fairly vulnerable to attacks, the tesseron's sweeping beam graser attack is so deadly that few opponents can get shots off against it.
LanguageData.Mech_Tesseron.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.Mech_Tesseron.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.Mech_Tesseron.tools.head.label: head
